data.text:
Now Showing @ The Waters Edge Cinema

SKINCARE

MY PENGUIN FRIEND

SPECIAL SCREENING

WEDNESDAY AUGUST 21ST

5PM

BOB MACKIE:NAKED ILLUSION

FOLLOWED BY A CONVERSATION WITH BOB MACKIE!

Provincetown Film Society

The Provincetown Film Society is an advocate for gender, racial, and LGBTQIA+ representation in film, providing year-round programming that allows voices of all kinds to be heard.

Provincetown Film Festival

The best in American and International independent film with more than 150 feature-length and short film screenings, parties, panel discussions and events.

Provincetown Film Institute

The Gabrielle A. Hanna Provincetown Film Institute offers year-round workshops, residencies, scholarships, and conferences including the Women Filmmaker’s Residency Program and the Women’s Media Summit.

Waters Edge Cinema

The Waters Edge Cinema (WE) is a year-round two-screen state of the art movie house that showcases newly released films, mini-festivals, special guest presentations, and virtual screenings.

Donate

Help Support Year Round Cinema in Provincetown

Support Provincetown Film with your donation today and help us continue to showcase innovative films and empower diverse filmmakers.

JOB OPPORTUNITIES

Be a part of the Provincetown Film Society team! Here are the positions we are currently hiring:

Congratulations to the 2024 Award Winners

Congratulations to the award winners, announced yesterday, and thank you to ALL of the filmmakers who generously shared their beautiful work with our audiences this past week. You moved us and made us laugh, sparking conversations and friendships that will last a lifetime. You are now part of the PIFF family!

Learn More…

Provincetown International Film Festival Announces Lineup: Andrew Haigh, Colman Domingo Named Honorees

Celebrating its 26th year, the Provincetown International Film Festival (PIFF) announced today its lineup of narrative, documentary, and short films, as well as honorees for this year’s Filmmaker on the Edge and Excellence in Acting Awards. Andrew Haigh will be named 2024’s “Filmmaker on the Edge.” The acclaimed English writer/director is best known for WEEKEND,…

Learn More…

Help Provincetown Film Society Keep Film in the Spotlight in Ptown!

What a difference a year makes! We are happy to say that 2023 brought film back to the forefront in Provincetown. In June, the Provincetown International Film Festival (PIFF), a signature program of the Provincetown Film Society (PFS), exuberantly celebrated 25 years honoring and showcasing independent filmmakers on the edge.
